author: rse
msg: Fix `distclean' and `clean' targets in src/Makefile.tmpl to have same
behavior and to cleanup correctly even under enabled SHARED_CORE rule.

author: rse
msg: Use a more straight forward and thus less problematic (replace -n&p by -e)

author: rse
msg: Make sure the `configure' scripts doesn't fail when trying to guess the
domainname of the machine and there are multiple `domainname' and `search'

author: rse
msg: Add note about the SHARED_CORE requirement on some platforms also to the
INSTALL file because a lot of users don't read htdocs/manual/dso.html first.
